Le Vélo en Ville

56 words written on Mon, Apr 7 2008

a little bit of.

urban exploration.

down the levy road on the fixies.

a way google maps thinks you can’t go.

back to the katy trail, back down to the bottom, then back up it to knox, then, because the trail was a disaster of retarded humanity, back down a real road.
